hero.heading: We engineer the software that powers what's next
hero.desc: Enterprise-grade engineering for teams building at scale. From AI to ERP to cloud‑native SaaS—we turn complexity into your competitive edge.

footer: Engineering excellence, open-source first. We build and commercialize tools that help companies streamline, simplify, and secure modern DevOps.

case_studies_cta.heading: Ready to build what’s next?
case_studies_cta.desc: We partner with ambitious teams to solve hard engineering problems. Let’s talk about yours.

services.heading: Five disciplines, one standard
services.desc: From AI to cloud‑native SaaS — enterprise-grade engineering, purpose-built for teams who refuse to compromise.

case_studies.heading: Impact, measured
case_studies.desc: We don’t just ship code — we move business metrics. Real outcomes from real partnerships.

project.heading: Open source
project.desc: Tools we’ve built, open for everyone. Explore, contribute, and build with us.
project.0_text: A powerful open-source rule engine for Go. Define business rules in a human-readable format—making your app more flexible and maintainable.
project.1_text: Command-line monitoring for every part of your web app. Get alerts when your site is down or slow, configured with a simple JSON file.
project.2_text: Backend connector for the WhatsApp Business API. Integrates with AI platforms like Dify and Rasa out of the box.

faq.heading: Common questions
faq.desc: Everything you need to know. Can’t find an answer? Reach out to us directly.
faq.0_question: What is CTO as a Service (CTOaaS), and how can it benefit my company?
faq.0_answer: CTOaaS provides on-demand access to experienced technology leadership without the cost of a full-time executive. It helps enterprises with strategic IT planning, digital transformation, and technical decision-making to scale efficiently.
faq.1_question: How do you approach ERP implementation for enterprises?
faq.1_answer: We follow a structured process that includes business analysis, system selection, customization, integration, training, and post-implementation support to ensure seamless adoption and long-term success.
faq.2_question: What does your tech due diligence service cover?
faq.2_answer: Our tech due diligence includes codebase reviews, security assessments, scalability analysis, infrastructure evaluation, and compliance checks to ensure that your technology investments are low-risk and high-value.
faq.3_question: Why should we choose your consulting services over hiring an in-house team?
faq.3_answer: We offer specialized expertise, flexibility, and cost-effective solutions without the overhead of full-time employees. Our team brings years of experience in enterprise IT, ensuring faster implementation and better ROI.
